heroDescription: Integrate powerful AI image editing capabilities into your applications with our simple and intuitive REST API. Start creating amazing images in minutes.
quickStartDescription: Get started with Nano Banana API in three simple steps

fastResponse.title: Lightning Fast
fastResponse.description: Global CDN distribution with average response times under 2 seconds

highQuality.title: High Quality Output
highQuality.description: State-of-the-art AI models for professional-grade image generation and editing

easyIntegration.title: Easy Integration
easyIntegration.description: RESTful API with comprehensive documentation and SDKs in multiple languages

naturalLanguage.title: Natural Language
naturalLanguage.description: Edit images using simple text descriptions, no complex parameters required

enterpriseSecurity.title: Enterprise Security
enterpriseSecurity.description: Industry-standard encryption and authentication with 99.9% uptime SLA

realTimeSupport.title: Real-time Support
realTimeSupport.description: 24/7 technical support and comprehensive API documentation

step1.title: Get Your API Key
step1.description: Sign up and get your API key from the profile page

step2.title: Add to Request Headers
step2.description: Include your API key in the Authorization header of all requests

step3.title: Security Best Practices
step3.point1: Never expose your API key in client-side code
step3.point2: Rotate your keys regularly for enhanced security
step3.point3: Use environment variables to store your keys
step3.point4: Monitor your API usage in the dashboard

param.prompt: Text description of the image to generate
param.style: Art style (optional): realistic, anime, oil-painting, etc.

param.imageUrl: URL of the image to edit
param.prompt: Text description of the desired changes
param.preserveScene: Whether to preserve the original scene (default: true)

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join thousands of developers using Nano Banana API
